attributes.action: Change the national anthem to 'Land Of Hope and Glory'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that the national anthem should be changed to Land of Hope and Glory, as many people prefer this song, and the anthem should reflect the people of the country. We have paid for the Royal family to have the lifestyle they do and I think that should be enough for them, we shouldnt have to sing about them aswel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
